nodes.text: Andross was a male holocam operator on the planet Namore at some point during the Galactic Civil War. He worked with the journalist Hailey LaMelle.

Andross appeared in "Live And In (Bleeding) Color...," a short companion narrative included in Heroes & Rogues, a 1995 sourcebook written by Paul Sudlow and Rick Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
